Text: Is it just me or is this in a different language?

It only has one audio track of which is in English so I have no idea where a Russian sound track is coming from. I just checked the file again with zero issues on vlc. I'm sorry if it's not playing right for you.

@systemhost; Sorry, meant to clarify; the on-screen "setting text" preceding each story is in Cyrillic instead of English. Had to Wiki the movie to figure out what the English equivalent was...

Otherwise, Great post.. A10/V10

Ohhhh, so sorry, I never noticed, I've just been trying to provide some slightly higher quality (bit-rate) MP4 conversions. As much as I admire mkv's they're still not supported on every playback device.

Appreciate the mp4, systemhost - Thanks for you work.

Thanks to all seeders and leechers - Will seed to at least 20
